Module Breakout
Package breakout.balls

Class BallTemplate

java.lang.Object
breakout.balls.BallTemplate
Direct Known Subclasses:
RubberBall
public abstract class BallTemplate extends Object
This class is a template class for creating balls

  • Constructor Details

    • BallTemplate

      public BallTemplate(Point2D startBallPos, int radius, BufferedImage image)
      BallTemplate Constructor

      This constructor sets the ball position at startBallPos, create ball face, create SpriteSheet with image, and setup, setDown, setLeft and setRight

      Parameters:
      startBallPos - Point2D
      radius - int
      image - BufferedImage
